I don't know if this will get noticed, but Karthas was originally released as Lord of the now forgotten Howling Marsh, from which he was also turned into a Lich.

> It is thought that Karthus was a mage who, in life, was foolish enough to enter the fetid waters seeking his fortune, and that he was forever transformed by whatever dark magic permeates the swamp. - ***Original Backstory***

During the Twisted Treeline/Shadow Isles update his origin was changed to be from the Shadow Isles itself. However, there seems to be an oversight in his release backstory, as you don't acknowledge the character's history:

> On his release, Karthus was a champion from the Shadow Isles, or at least created there.

I love the update, but could you possibly clarify this? Was his release lore simply forgotten about, or is there something I don't know?
If you're changing Karthus to be more Twisted Isle with the greenish-blue animations and what-not, can we expect this with possible Mordekaiser and Evelynn updates?
